h3.a: A message from the Superintendent regarding Commencement

div.div: Recently, my office received several messages regarding graduation. We completely understand the concerns, fears, frustrations, and disappointment with the news that our schools are closed for the rest of the year.

h3.a: A message from the Superintendent regarding the school closure

div.div: On Thursday, April 9, 2020, Governor Wolf and the Pennsylvania Department of Education ordered all K-12 schools and programs to be closed through the end of the 2019-2020 school year.

h3.a: PreK - Grade 5 Website is Launched for Students and Families

div.div: To support you and your children we have created a common website that will serve as the central location for all distance learning activities for students in pre-k through fifth grade.

h3.a: Special Education - Pre-K - Grade 3 Google Site / Resources

div.div: Click on the link below to access a series of resources for you to access during this school closure due to the COVID-19 pandemic. This site was created by our Special Education Teachers at the Primary level.

h3.a: Google Sites Introduction and Messages to Students from Staff
